feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 early in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
